summary: A multi-disciplined Finance & Technology risk management leader with over 18 years in senior roles, working at Group Headquarters level for large multi-national Telco’s optimizing performance and maturity in assurance functions across 25+ countries across North America, Europe, Asia & Africa. Experience in transforming assurance functions, design risk frameworks, rolling out maturity programs, promoting risk awareness culture, and C-Level engagement to achieve organizational objectives.
